title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
overview: Two seemingly dumb teens struggle to prepare a historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

title: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
overview: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

title: The Princess Bride
overview: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.
